steps.title: This dating app has 60,000 + users, so you’re sure to find someone you like!
steps.content: This dating app has 60,000 + users, so you’re sure to find someone you like! You can find the MD Date app on both iOS and Android devices. Once you’ve downloaded it, create a profile with an interesting bio and some pictures of yourself. Then, swipe through the men in uniform to learn a little more about them, and start chatting with the people you want to get to know more. The nice thing about this app is that it has details about which branch of the military your potential date is in. That way, you can learn a little more about their day to day life before you even start chatting.

steps.title: This app connects interested people from around the globe.
steps.content: This app connects interested people from around the globe. Once you download the app on either an iOS or Android device, you can fill out your profile and have the app match you with other single people. From there, you can press the heart on their profiles to let them know you like them, or you can start a chat by sending them a message. [1] X Research source This app has over 1 million users as of 2021, so you’ll have plenty of people to pick from.

steps.title: You can look for love on this app, or you can just meet new friends.
steps.content: You can look for love on this app, or you can just meet new friends. Once you download the app, you’ll be asked a list of questions so people can get to know you more. Then, you can upload some pictures of yourself and indicate what type of relationship you’re looking for. After that, you can look through your potential matches and start conversations with interesting people. [2] X Research source This app has the additional feature of video chatting, so you can talk with someone via video before meeting up with them in person.

steps.title: Fill out your profile to start looking for interesting military men.
steps.content: Fill out your profile to start looking for interesting military men. This app is geared toward people in the military, but it also caters to those who appreciate a guy in uniform. Fill out some basic information about yourself, upload a photo, then start looking through profiles to find someone that you like. You can send your matches texts, pictures, and even videos on this app.

steps.title: You can meet any man in uniform on this app, including military personnel.
steps.content: You can meet any man in uniform on this app, including military personnel. Download the app and upload some flattering pics of yourself, then write an interesting bio. You can also indicate whether you’re a uniform-wearer as well, or just a civilian. Once you’re all set up, the app will match you with people that you might like. From there, you can like their profile, start a conversation, or look through other potential matches. [3] X Research source You might meet people like police officers, firefighters, doctors, flight attendants, and more!

steps.title: If you’re serious about finding love, this is the dating website for you.
steps.content: If you’re serious about finding love, this is the dating website for you. eHarmony is geared toward singles who want to settle down, not ones who are interested in one-time flings. Sign up for an account and fill out your profile (the more detailed, the better). The website will match you with single people in your area, and you can either chat with them or move onto someone else. And, you can use the site’s search function to find military men in your region. [4] X Trustworthy Source Consumer Reports Nonprofit organization dedicated to consumer advocacy and product testing Go to source While you do have to pay for a permanent membership, you can try eHarmony for free by signing up for a trial.

steps.title: This dating site caters to people who are highly educated.
steps.content: This dating site caters to people who are highly educated. If you’re looking for a military man who is book smart, this is the website for you. There are over 30 million members world-wide, so your odds of finding someone you like are very high. Head to the site and take a personality test before signing up, then fill out your profile. Then, you’ll be matched with other smart singles in your area.

steps.title: While it isn’t military-specific, this dating site has over 40 million members.
steps.content: While it isn’t military-specific, this dating site has over 40 million members. If you treat dating like a numbers game, you’re bound to find military men on this website. Sign up for a free trial to see if you like it, and fill out a profile with interesting facts about yourself. Then, look through your potential matches to find guys that you like.

steps.title: Many military men are religious, which makes this a good site to try.
steps.content: Many military men are religious, which makes this a good site to try. In fact, a recent study shows that around 69% of servicemen and women are Christian. [5] X Trustworthy Source PubMed Central Journal archive from the U.S. National Institutes of Health Go to source If you also value religion in your relationship, head on over to Christian Mingle and fill out a profile. You can start out with a free trial before signing up for a full account to see if the site is worth it for you. [6] X Trustworthy Source Consumer Reports Nonprofit organization dedicated to consumer advocacy and product testing Go to source

steps.title: This site asks you to fill out a questionnaire when you sign up.
steps.content: This site asks you to fill out a questionnaire when you sign up. It will ask you things about your personality, your hobbies, your likes/dislikes, and what you’re looking for in a partner. Then, it will match you with other people based on their questionnaire to see if you two are compatible. Although you can’t search for military men specifically, you have a good chance of finding someone special on this site. [7] X Trustworthy Source Consumer Reports Nonprofit organization dedicated to consumer advocacy and product testing Go to source Some people find that this questionnaire can take them a while to fill out, so set aside a good chunk of time before signing up.

steps.title: You’ll have to do your own sleuthing, but you can find military guys this way.
steps.content: You’ll have to do your own sleuthing, but you can find military guys this way. Since Tinder automatically shows you people’s pictures and bio, you can click through and find military men that you like. Swipe left on everyone else, and only chat with the guys you match with—that way, you can weed out everyone else from the start. [8] X Trustworthy Source Consumer Reports Nonprofit organization dedicated to consumer advocacy and product testing Go to source Tinder is very customizable, and you can set your age and location range once you sign up for an account.
